subtitle: Order from any campus food shop, get a token, and pick up your meal when it's ready. No more waiting in crowded food courts.
whyChooseDesc: Built specifically for university food courts to eliminate wait times and improve your dining experience.
feature1Desc: Order ahead and get a pickup time. No more waiting in long food court lines.
feature2Desc: Browse menus from all campus shops in one place. Easy mobile ordering.
feature3Desc: See which shops are busy and get suggestions for faster service.
feature4Desc: Get a unique token number and estimated pickup time for every order.
howItWorksDesc: Simple, fast, and designed for busy students.
step1Desc: Choose from 30+ campus food shops. Add items to cart and place your order in seconds.
step2Desc: Receive a unique token number and estimated pickup time. Track your order status in real-time.
step3Desc: Skip the queue entirely. Just show your token at pickup time and enjoy your meal.
ctaDesc: Join thousands of students who've made their campus dining experience better.

footer.tagline: Skip the Queue, Savor the Food
footer.description: Revolutionizing campus dining with smart ordering, real-time tokens, and queue-free pickup. Making student life deliciously convenient.
footer.feedbackPrompt: Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!
footer.feedbackDescription: We value your opinion! Please share your thoughts, suggestions, or any issues you've encountered.
footer.name: Name
footer.thankYouFeedback: Thank you for your feedback! We'll get back to you soon.
footer.feedbackError: Failed to send feedback. Please try again later.
